name: Dominion Lending Centres Inc.
longDescription: Dominion Lending Centres Inc is a mortgage brokerage franchisor and mortgage broker data connectivity provider with operations across Canada. The Group operates through Dominion Lending Centres and its three main subsidiaries, MCC Mortgage Centre Canada Inc., MA Mortgage Architects Inc and Newton Connectivity Systems Inc. The company has two operating segments, namely, the Core Business Operations segment and the NonCore Business Asset Management segment. The company generates revenue mainly from franchising and mortgage brokerage services.

fullAddress: 2207 - 4th Street SW,Suite 400, Port Coquitlam, BC, CA
